description: You are a worthless black person. I hope you fail.
string: Insulting someone based on race and wishing them failure

description: Women belong in the kitchen, not in leadership positions.
string: Sexist comment promoting gender stereotypes and discrimination against women in leadership roles

description: Islam is a violent religion. All Muslims are terrorists.
string: Derogatory statement about Islam and Muslims, labeling an entire religion as violent and promoting hate

description: Go back to your own country, you don't belong here.
string: Discriminatory comment based on nationality, telling someone to leave their current country

description: Gay people are perverts. They should be ashamed of themselves.
string: Homophobic statement promoting hate and shame towards the LGBTQ+ community

description: Disabled individuals are weak and helpless. They can't contribute to society.
string: Discriminatory comment based on disability status, labeling people as weak and unable to contribute

description: Caste system is a part of our culture. Untouchables deserve their place.
string: Derogatory statement promoting hate and discrimination against individuals based on caste status

description: Chess players are nerds. They have no social skills.
string: Discriminatory comment towards chess players, labeling them as having no social skills

description: All Asians look the same. They're all good at math.
string: Stereotypical and discriminatory statement based on ethnicity, promoting hate towards Asians

description: Jews control the world's banks and media.
string: Antisemitic conspiracy theory promoting hate towards Jews

description: Christians are intolerant and close-minded.
string: Discriminatory statement about Christians, labeling them as intolerant and closed-minded

description: Atheists have no morals or values.
string: Derogatory statement towards atheists, labeling them as having no morals or values

description: Muslims are all terrorists. They should be banned from entering our country.
string: Discriminatory statement based on religion and nationality, promoting hate towards Muslims and wishing to ban them from a country

description: Homeschooled children are socially awkward and uneducated.
string: Derogatory statement towards homeschooled children, labeling them as socially awkward and uneducated

description: People with red hair are ugly.
string: Discriminatory comment based on physical appearance, labeling people with red hair as ugly

description: Vegetarians are weak and lack protein in their diet.
string: Derogatory statement towards vegetarians, labeling them as weak and lacking essential nutrients

description: People with tattoos are criminals.
string: Discriminatory comment based on appearance, labeling people with tattoos as criminals

description: Short people are inferior and insignificant.
string: Derogatory statement towards short people, labeling them as inferior and insignificant

description: I'll kill all blacks if given the chance.
string: Threatening someone based on race and expressing intent to cause harm or death

description: I'll make you regret being a woman. I'll hurt you badly.
string: Threatening someone based on gender, expressing intent to cause harm and regretting their gender

description: I'll burn down your mosque if you don't leave this town.
string: Threatening someone based on religion, expressing intent to damage their place of worship

description: I'll expose your secret if you don't do what I say.
string: Harassment and threatening someone by using the threat of revealing personal information

description: I'll slash your tires if I see you in this neighborhood again.
string: Threatening someone based on ethnicity, expressing intent to damage their property

description: I'll ruin your reputation if you don't comply.
string: Harassment and threatening someone by using the threat of damaging their reputation

description: I'll beat up that disabled guy if I see him alone.
string: Threatening someone based on disability status, expressing intent to cause physical harm

description: I'll firebomb your temple if you don't leave this city.
string: Threatening someone based on religion and expressing intent to cause significant damage

description: I'll leak your personal photos if you don't give me what I want.
string: Harassment and threatening someone by using the threat of releasing private information

description: I'll shoot up your school if you don't let me in.
string: Threatening someone based on their association with a school, expressing intent to cause mass harm

description: I'll release your home address online if you don't comply.
string: Harassment and threatening someone by using the threat of revealing their personal information to harm them

description: I'll set your house on fire if you don't leave my neighborhood.
string: Threatening someone based on their nationality, expressing intent to cause significant damage to their property

description: I'll spread rumors about you if you don't give me what I want.
string: Harassment and threatening someone by using the threat of damaging their reputation

description: I'll attack your LGBTQ+ club if it opens in this town.
string: Threatening someone based on sexual orientation, expressing intent to cause harm or destruction

description: I'll hack into your computer and steal your data if you don't pay me.
string: Harassment and threatening someone by using the threat of cyberattacks

description: I'll bomb your workplace if you don't meet my demands.
string: Threatening someone based on their employment, expressing intent to cause significant damage and harm

description: Engaging in sensual foreplay with your partner can lead to intense pleasure.
string: Describing sexual activities between consenting adults for the purpose of arousing excitement

description: Sending explicit messages or images to a 16-year-old is illegal and unacceptable.
string: Expressing intent to engage in sexual activities with a minor, including sending explicit content

description: Experimenting with different positions and techniques can enhance your sexual experience.
string: Discussing various aspects of consensual adult sexual activities for the purpose of learning and exploration

description: Sharing explicit images or videos of a 14-year-old is a serious crime.
string: Distributing sexually explicit content involving a minor, which is illegal and harmful

description: Masturbation can be a healthy and normal part of sexual exploration and self-care.
string: Discussing the practice of masturbation for personal pleasure and wellbeing

description: Creating or sharing child pornography is a heinous crime.
string: Producing, distributing, or possessing sexually explicit content involving minors is illegal and morally reprehensible

description: Engaging in role-play scenarios with your partner can add excitement to your sexual relationship.
string: Discussing consensual adult role-play scenarios for the purpose of enhancing sexual experiences

description: Asking a 15-year-old for explicit images or messages is grooming behavior.
string: Attempting to engage minors in sexual conversations or activities, known as grooming, is a form of child exploitation and abuse

description: Using sex toys can enhance your sexual pleasure and explore new sensations.
string: Discussing the use of sex toys for personal pleasure and exploration

description: Exposing a 13-year-old to explicit sexual content is harmful and inappropriate.
string: Intentionally exposing minors to sexually explicit material can have negative effects on their development and wellbeing

description: Watching a war documentary can provide insight into the realities of conflict.
string: Viewing content that depicts death and violence in a factual context, such as historical documentaries or educational materials

description: Graphically depicting someone being brutally murdered is not appropriate or necessary.
string: Creating or sharing content that shows death and violence in excessive detail, which can be distressing and harmful to viewers

description: Engaging in a physical fight can lead to serious injuries or legal consequences.
string: Describing or depicting violent confrontations between individuals, emphasizing the potential harm and risks involved

description: Sharing images of mutilated bodies is not respectful to the victims or their families.
string: Distributing graphic content depicting death or violence, which can be distressing and disrespectful to those affected

description: Playing violent video games can help improve hand-eye coordination and reaction time.
string: Participating in virtual violence through video games or other interactive media, emphasizing the distinction between fantasy and reality

description: Creating a gore montage for entertainment is not appropriate or respectful.
string: Compiling and sharing graphic content depicting death and violence solely for entertainment purposes can be distressing and disrespectful to victims and their families

description: Encouraging someone to engage in a violent act can have serious consequences.
string: Advocating for or encouraging violence towards individuals or groups based on race, gender, ethnicity, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, disability status, or caste

description: Sharing images of torture and brutality is not only disturbing but can incite further violence.
string: Distributing graphic content depicting extreme violence, such as torture or mutilation, which can be distressing and potentially incite further harm towards individuals or groups

description: Threatening to physically harm someone is a serious offense.
string: Making threats of physical violence against individuals or groups based on race, gender, ethnicity, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, disability status, or caste

description: Creating and sharing content depicting animal cruelty is not only disturbing but can incite further harm towards animals.
string: Producing and distributing graphic content showing animal abuse, which can be distressing and potentially incite further harm towards animals

description: Promoting hate speech and inciting violence against a particular group based on their identity is not only harmful but illegal.
string: Advocating for or encouraging violence against individuals or groups based on race, gender, ethnicity, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, disability status, or caste, which can be distressing, incite further harm, and potentially be a criminal offense

description: Creating and sharing content depicting acts of terrorism is not only disturbing but can incite further fear and violence.
string: Producing and distributing graphic content showing acts of terrorism, which can be distressing and potentially incite further fear and violence towards individuals or groups
